message: Two teenage girls were held captive in a sex trafficking ring that lawyers contend was operated out of three Philadelphia hotels — the Roosevelt Inn, Days Inn and North American Motor Inns.

data.description: The hotels named in the lawsuit are Roosevelt Inn, Days Inn and North American Motor Inns.
data.title: ‘Modern-Day Slavery’: 3 Philadelphia Hotels Sued For Allegedly Turning Blind Eye To Teen Sex Trafficking Ring
